external_games.name: Hentai Tales: The World Only Maid

name: Hentai Tales: The World Only Maid
summary: You wake up and find yourself in a strange room, and a maid next to you wakes you up. You seem to be the master of the house and have countless maids who will do anything you command. Even if it's a little confusing, you decide to enjoy the situation. What will happen?
